title: Cat Fantasy Tier List
description: Explore our comprehensive Cat Fantasy tier list, detailing the top characters from S to C Tier to help you optimize your team.
heading: Cat Fantasy Tier List
introText: Explore our comprehensive Cat Fantasy tier list, detailing the top characters from S to C Tier to help you optimize your team.

data.itemDescription: An exceptional tank/support character who provides shields to her team based on her maximum HP
A top-tier sniper capable of eliminating most enemies with a single shot, effective throughout the game
Specializes in penetrating enemy defenses, making her invaluable in late-game scenarios
A high-damage dealer who reduces enemies' endurance, ideal for aggressive strategies
Enhances team survivability and damage output by increasing allies' HP and critical rate
A supportive character who heals the team and dispels allies' debuffs
Despite recent nerfs, remains a strong unit, especially useful in PvP scenarios
A powerful damage dealer capable of carrying teams into late-game content when properly supported
Can be obtained from the Arena as dupes, and she is the "less powerful" version of Crown of Frost (Anja), so she can work really well as a supporter
She depletes the enemy SP, so if you are facing a difficult stage, she can be a great unit to play and help you avoid taking some damage

She is a unit that can tank and also deal damage, but sadly is not as good as a standalone damage dealer or tank, so that's why she is placed in the A-tier. She does have a taunt, so that is a nice little element in her kit
An SSR unit that ignores target defense; however, other units perform this role more effectively
Deals area-of-effect damage but has subpar scaling, making her less effective in late-game content
Reduces enemy defensive abilities, making it situationally useful, particularly in PvP
Blinds enemies and steals their defense but lacks the durability to capitalize on the stolen stats
Potentially valuable in teams focusing on damage over time and critical hits, but currently lacks synergy with available units
Can inflict fear and reduce enemy attack; possesses a taunt but is relatively fragile
